评论概述: Accurate Sizing Chart- Quality Shirt - Nice Color
评论详情: My husband likes this shirt. The color is a really nice break from the blues and greys. He typically wears a 2x but normally this brand calls for an upsize. I didn't on this one due to the shoulder size on the sizing chart. I'm glad it did. Order based on measurements.

I have to say, this dress shirt is a pleasant surprise! The fit is spot on, and the midnight blue color looks even better in person. The fabric is soft and lightweight, with just the right amount of stretch, which means I can wear it all day without feeling restricted. It’s perfect for a long workday, and I still feel polished when I go out afterward.  The shirt has a nice balance of being formal enough for business meetings but casual enough to rock without a tie on a night out. I’ve worn it with a suit jacket for a more professional look and even dressed it down with jeans. Either way, it looks great. The stitching is neat, the buttons are sturdy, and the spread collar gives it a clean, classic appearance.  It’s machine washable too, so maintenance is easy. I’ve already tossed it in the wash a couple of times, and it still looks like new. For under $25, it’s a steal, and I might just grab a few more colors. If you're looking for a sharp, comfortable shirt that works for pretty much any occasion, this one’s definitely worth it!

This particular shirt is black with white polka dots.  It's very soft to the touch and reminds me of silk.  It has black buttons and a 3 button sleeve cuff and no pockets. 评论概述: Casual style with classic lines and a great fit

Cuff the sleeves, loosen the collar and untuck this shirt and its a great top for going out. Really comfortable, versatile and well made.

评论概述: COOFANDY - a name I keep coming back to!
评论详情: Shirt fits perfectly, exactly how I expect it to. Shirt is extremely well put together and color saturation is beautiful. Holds up to washing without an issue and doesn't shrink when run through the dryer.

This is a very nicely made, true to size shirt. The color is exactly as represented, and the fit and cut of this shirt is tailored enough that it doesn't look boxy, but not so slim that there's any pulling at the buttons or across the back of the shoulders. We've ordered shirts from this seller before and have never been disappointed with the quality and longevity of the shirts. They wear well, wash well, and are standing the test of time.

评论概述: Sized up and glad I did
评论详情: Really nice dress shirt by Coofandy.  I actually really like this brand and have a lot of clothes from this seller.  I sized up on this dress shirt and glad that I did.  I really didn't want the shirt to be too tight.  The material of this shirt has a good amount of stretch, but not too strecthy.  I really like the light blue color and the fact that the buttons are also blue.  That's a nice touch rather than white buttons.  I'm a tall guy 6'4" and the sleeves fit great and the shirt it's too short.  Overall, I'm very happy with the shirt and highly recommend the product.

评论概述: Beautiful And Classy, Quality Material And Craftmanship
评论详情: Size LARGE measurements lying flat unstretched are: Chest 24 inches across, length 31 inches, cuff 4 3/4 inches and length of sleeve 25 3/4 inches. This is an absolutely beautiful shirt. The pictures I posted are actually lighter in color than the shirt really is. It is a medium to dark burgundy color. It is 96% polyester and 4% spandex. It is a heavy material with a luxurious feel and look. It looks like silk due to the sheen of the material. The material is not see-through at all. Care instructions are sewn onto the shirt. This shirt is comparable to the ones you see for sale in high end retail stores. There are 7 matching burgundy buttons down the front and two on the cuff of the sleeve for fit adjustment. No pockets. I am very satisfied with this quality crafted shirt and can give it a great recommendation.

I am usually very happy with Coofandy products. This one leaves me flat. Pun intended. There is a bit of a shine to the shirt that I did not expect. Glossy. The fit is also a little off in the sleeves. They are a bit long and oddly wide. Never seen that with a Coofandy product. Maybe after a wash or 2 it will seem better.. As I said, it's rare when I don't give a good review to a Coofandy item.
You can't fail with Coofandy. This shirt fit perfectly, looked great and had a pleasing feel to the fabric.

I have several shirts from Coofandy, as well as a couple vests as well.  This shirt is a great representation of their products - well made, comfortable, and looks great.  It fits true to size and the color matches the picture.

I've ordered a number of shirts from coofandy and have generally been very happy with them. This shirt fits nicely, is very comfortable, and looks good. I'm happy to have found a good clothing brand that fits me well and makes nice quality products.

评论概述: One of the most versatile shirts I own!
评论详情: (In dress/business shirts I normally wear a 16.5" neck, 34-35 sleeve. I ordered the Medium in this shirt--it's the correct size in all respects.)  I'm amazed by this dress shirt, in a way that I'm not normally amazed by everyday items of clothing. It looks exactly the photos, the color matches the pics, the fit is very good, and it can be dressed up or down as needed. I've honestly never owned a more versatile shirt.  It can be worn open-neck, of course. But it accepts a necktie quite well, even though the collar has only a small amount of stiffening, and no collar stays. Sleeves can be worn down or rolled up with equal comfort. The fabric has the tiniest bit of a sheen to it, more similar to a polished cotton (though it's a polyester/spandex blend) than to silk. So it doesn't hit as a "shiny shirt" at all, but more like a dress shirt that was just paid a compliment and is grinning a little bit. The spandex does give it some stretch, though I was pleased to note that this isn't (and didn't appear intended to be) a muscle shirt that hugs the torso. I ain't got that kind of torso, so I appreciate the drape and cut of this design that looks a little tapered and flattering without shouting "gym-bro" to passersby.  Hard to find anything wrong with this shirt, but if pressured I would say that the sleeves below the elbow are a touch blousy. If it's warm enough, I'll wear the sleeves rolled up. If it's cool enough to wear the sleeves down, I'd probably wear a sweater or jacket over them. I don't care much for even the hint of a blousy "pirate" sleeve. This isn't that bad, by any stretch--just be aware that the sleeve will likely be looser around the wrist than on a more structured chambray style business shirt.

The COOFANDY Men's Long Sleeve Regular Fit Button Down Dress Shirt is a quality shirt I purchased for my adult son who has to wear a suit several times a month for work. He must dress conservatively and needs long-wearing, quality shirts in his wardrobe. This option had a good price point, a Spandex blend for some stretch, and easy sizing. The shirt just arrived, so I cannot write of how well it launders (it states it can be thrown in the laundry at home) or the longevity of the shirt, but we are optimistic. At this time, I recommend.
